original_text: Who is the liar? It is whoever denies that Jesus is the Christ. Such a person is the antichrist—denying the Father and the Son.
korean_text: 거짓말하는 자가 누구냐 예수께서 그리스도이심을 부인하는 자가 아니냐 아버지와 아들을 부인하는 그가 적그리스도니

sentences.original_text: It is whoever denies that Jesus is the Christ.
Such a person is the antichrist
denying the Father and the Son.
